text:
@AshleyRParker Presidential would be confronting Putin about bounties on American soldiers .

Presidential would be owning his neglectful & criminal response to the Coronavirus pandemic .

Presidential would be holding Roger Stone accountable for his CRIMINAL  actions .

Seriously ... WTF ?!?
